description: A hiking shoe to stand out from the crowd, the Predict Hike Mid Gore-Tex ensures a comfy stride on any given path. With Energy Surge technology for long-lasting cushioning, this outdoor all-rounder has Gore-Tex to keep the weather out & a mid-cut collar to hug your feet in & keep your ride cozy, while deep lugs hold ground on any terrain.
name: Salomon Predict Hike Mid GTX - Mens
